name: SparkDEX
description: SparkDEX is an all-in-one DeFi Hub on Flare Network, featuring a perpetual exchange designed for advanced cryptocurrency trading. Built on the Flare Network, it provides tools for traders, liquidity providers, and yield farmers to execute sophisticated strategies in a seamless and efficient environment. SparkDEX is pioneering next-generation DeFi by harnessing major developments in artificial intelligence, high-performance DeFi tooling, and on-chain data aggregation and analytics
